participant_1.background:

I start my day with a cup of coffee and a bit of gardening, which helps to calm me down before I start my day.

I keep my body and mind active through yoga and meditation.
I sometimes miss my friends because I have a pet iguana that takes up a lot of my time.

content.text: Hello! How is your day going?
Pretty good, thanks! I am doing some gardening today and I am really enjoying the peace and quiet.
I love gardening! I just got into it this year and I am hooked.
That's great! What are you growing this year?
I am growing tomatoes, peppers, herbs, and strawberries.
Wow! That's a lot of plants! I am just growing some tomatoes and peppers.
I have a lot of space in my backyard so I decided to go all out.
That's awesome! I wish I had that much space.
I love gardening because it's a great way to relax and get some fresh air.
It really is! I also love the feeling of accomplishment when I see my plants grow.
Me too! I love taking care of my plants and watching them grow.
What is your favorite part of gardening?
My favorite part is harvesting the vegetables and fruits and eating them
